没前: (ぼつぜん) - prior to death; during one's lifetime

没年: (ぼつねん) - one's age at death

沢山: (takusan) - muito, muitos, bastante, muitos, um grande número, muito, uma grande quantidade, um bom tanto; suficiente, suficiente, muito, muitos, bastante, muitos, um grande número, muito, uma grande quantidade, um bom tanto; suficiente, suficiente; suficiente, excessivo, demais

沮む: (はばむ) - to keep someone from doing; to stop; to prevent; to check; to hinder; to obstruct; to oppose; to thwart
沮止: (そし) - obstruction; check; hindrance; prevention; impediment; interdiction; preemption; blocking
河伯: (かはく) - kappa (mythical water-dwelling creature); (河伯 only) river god

河口: (かわぐち) - mouth of river; estuary
河口港: (かこうこう) - port at the mouth of a river
河岸を変える: (かしをかえる) - to try a new venue for eating, drinking, night amusement, etc.
河岸段丘: (かがんだんきゅう) - river terrace
河川敷: (かせんじき) - flood plain; river terrace; area between river and river bank
河巨頭: (カワゴンドウ) - Irrawaddy dolphin (Orcaella brevirostris)
河床: (かわどこ) - (かしょう, かわどこ only) riverbed; (かわどこ, かわゆか, ゆか only) raised platform on the bank of a river for enjoying the cool in summer
河明かり: (かわあかり) - glow of a river in the darkness; surface of a river gleaming in the darkness; gleam on a river at dusk
河明り: (かわあかり) - glow of a river in the darkness; surface of a river gleaming in the darkness; gleam on a river at dusk
河沿い: (かわぞい) - along the river; riverside
河津掛け: (かわづかけ) - {sumo} hooking backward counter throw
河清: (かせい) - clearing of the river water
河獺: (カワウソ) - otter (Lutra lutra); Japanese river otter (Lutra lutra whiteleyi)
河神: (かしん) - guardian deity of rivers; river god

河童巻き: (かっぱまき) - cucumber sushi wrapped in nori (seaweed)
